com.application.components.dtdParser

Class DTDParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.application.components.dtdParser.DTDParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DTDParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Parses an external DTD or the DTD in an XML document and creates a DTD object.

    While DTDParser checks for most syntactic errors in the DTD, it does not check for all of them. (For example, it does not check if entities are well-formed.) Thus, results are undetermined if the DTD is not syntactically correct.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ronald Bourret, Miguel Urízar Salinas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • parseXMLDocument

        public DTD parseXMLDocument(org.xml.sax.InputSource src,
                   java.util.Hashtable namespaceURIs)
                     throws XMLMiddlewareException,
                            java.net.MalformedURLException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            java.io.EOFException
        Parse the DTD in an XML document containing an internal subset, reference to an external subset, or both.
        Parameters:
        src - A SAX InputSource for the XML document.
        namespaceURIs - A Hashtable of keyed by prefixes used in the DTD, mapping these to namespace URIs. May be null.
        Returns:
        The DTD object.
        Throws:
        XMLMiddlewareException - Thrown if a DTD error is found.
        java.io.EOFException - Thrown if EOF is reached prematurely.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - Thrown if a system ID is malformed.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs.

      • parseExternalSubset

        public DTD parseExternalSubset(org.xml.sax.InputSource src,
                      java.util.Hashtable namespaceURIs)
                        throws XMLMiddlewareException,
                               java.net.MalformedURLException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               java.io.EOFException
        Parse the DTD in an external subset.
        Parameters:
        src - A SAX InputSource for DTD (external subset).
        namespaceURIs - A Hashtable of keyed by prefixes used in the DTD, mapping these to namespace URIs. May be null.
        Returns:
        The DTD object.
        Throws:
        XMLMiddlewareException - Thrown if a DTD error is found.
        java.io.EOFException - Thrown if EOF is reached prematurely.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - Thrown if a system ID is malformed.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs.
